Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2014 04:27PM Char613 wrote: I am new to this site myself I'm waiting on core biopsies results I had the needle aspiration already. I dunno why but ever since I found my lump in the summer all everyone says is don't worry it is benign your only 30 and to be honest I am so sick of hearing that I came hear thinking maybe this will be a good place for support compassion and understanding at a different level. I have not spoke much about my feelings and my journey with family and friends because it's filled with automatic don't worry and then bam I am told it needs more tests ya know and I couldn't help but worry. I'm considering starting my own thread Kristin I feel for you it is scary and the waiting games feel like they drag on but before you know it you will have your answer I will be end love and prayers your way no matter what the outcome feel free to message me if you need to vent take care
Posts.Title: Abnormal Mammo and US. Biopsy next. kris1114 kris1114
